title: Pasta with Green Beans and Pesto
ingredients: 8 ounces whole grain penne or short pasta
directions: Bring a medium pot of water to a boil over medium high heat. Add ½ teaspoon of salt and green beans. Cook green beans 5 minutes, remove from water with a slotted spoon and drop into a bowl of ice water to blench. Set aside. /p In the same pot of boiling water, cook the pasta according to package directions. Drain. /p In one serving bowl, mix hot pasta, green beans, pesto, almonds, basil, and salt and pepper to taste. /p Drizzle with olive oil and serve immediately. /p Serving Size: 1/6 of total yield /p Calories 320
